metadata.title: CVE-2023-41101 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the captive portal in OpenNDS before version10.1.3. get_query in http_microhttpd.c does not validate the length of thequery string of GET requests. This leads to a stack-based buffer overflowin versions 9.x and earlier, and to a heap-based buffer overflow inversions 10.x and later. Attackers may exploit the issue to crash OpenNDS(Denial-of-Service condition) or to inject and execute arbitrary bytecode(Remote Code Execution).

criterions.comment: opennds package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
